chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin Arthur Severson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Justin Arthur Severson was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Justin Arthur Severson is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Justin Arthur Severson was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot, ADA:   Sharon Correll w/ N. Ranaweera  DF ATTY:  Dan Firkus   DF:  Justin Arthur Severson appeared from jail. Case called at 8:25 am w/o jurors present. Parties review Voir Dire and Preliminary Instructions. Jurors will not ask questions. Parties have rec'd copy of pre-tumbled list. Parties review Motions. Recess. Case recalled at 8:52 am. Atty Firkus makes statement. Court rules information re: Probation Agent does not need to come in. Parties agree to four strikes each. There will not be an alternate. Parties receive tumbled jury list. Court questions Def re: priors. Court finds Def is waiving right to trail on this issue on alone. Recess. Case recalled at 9:12 am with jurors present. Oath to the Jurors as to Qualifications at 9:13 am. Jurors seated for Voir Dire at 9:18 am. Voir Dire conducted by the court at 9:20 am. Juror #237 dismissed for cause. Voir Dire conducted by ADA Correll at 9:39 am. Voir Dire conducted by Atty Firkus at 9:57 am. Jurors chosen for trial at 10:07 am. Oath to the Jurors for trial at 10:08 am. Jurors out at 10:09 am. Court questions parties. Recess. Case recalled at 10:33 am w/o jurors present. Parties review Preliminary jury instructions. Recess. Case recalled at 10:42 am with Jurors present. Court reads Preliminary Jury Instructions. ADA Correll makes opening statement at 10:54 am. Atty Firkus makes opening statement at 10:59 am. S/T M. O'Keefe. Direct by ADA Correll. Cross by Atty Firkus. Redirect by ADA Correll. Witness released. S/T Officer Chevrier. Direct by ADA Correll. Cross by Atty Firkus. Redirect by ADA Correll. Witness released. S/T T. Peterson. Direct by ADA Correll. Jurors out at 11:59 am. ADA Correll makes statement. Ex #1 O/R. Atty Firkus makes statement. Recess. Case recalled at 1:05 pm  w/o jurors present. Parties review Jury Instructions. Jurors in at 1:21 pm. S/T K. Nueman. Direct by ADA Correll. Ex #2 and #3 O/R. Cross by Atty Firkus. Witness released. Ex #4 O/R. Jurors out at 1:50 pm. Court questions Def re: right to testify. Def does not wish to testify. Jurors in at 1:57 pm. Atty Firkus does not with to present evidence. Jurors out at 1:59 pm. Parties review draft of jury instructions. Recess. Case recalled at 2:11 pm w/o jurors present. Parties review final draft of verdict forms and instructions. Jurors in at 2:37 pm. Jurors given copies of Jury Instructions and Verdict Forms. Court reads Jury Instructions at 2:40 pm. ADA Correll gives closing statement at 2:55 pm. Atty Firkus makes closing statement at 3:01 pm. ADA Correll gives rebuttal statement at 3:11 pm. Court continues Jury Instructions at 3:15 pm. Oath to the Baliff at 3:20 pm. Jurors out for deliberations at 3:21 pm. Court questions parties. Jurors may receive exhibit #4. Recess. Case recalled at 4:33 pm w/o jurors present. There is a question from the Jury. Court reads. Parties answer. Recess. Case recalled at 4:45 pm w/o jurors present. There is another questions. Court reads. Parties answer question. Recess. Case recalled at 5:17 pm w/o jurors presnt. There is another question. Court reads. Parties review Jury Instructions. Recess. Case recalled at 5:26 pm w/o jurors present. Parties respond. Recess. Case recalled at 5:45 pm with jurors present. There is a verdict. Court reads. NG to Count #1, Guilty to Count #2. NG to Count #3.  Jurors released at 5:47 pm. JA to contact parties to get a date for sentencing. km
Filed by ADA Nieskes. Requesting a continuance of 2/4/2016 JT.
